sentences.en: A girl did not have room in her bikini for her card.
sentences.cn: 姑娘家穿件游泳衣,就没处装信用卡.

sentences.en: A one-piece is more flattering than a bikini.
sentences.cn: 一件式泳装比比基尼穿上去更好看。

sentences.en: A tanned blonde in a bikini swims languidly in the clear swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 一位身穿比基尼泳装、皮肤晒成古铜色的金发女郎在清澈的泳池里慵懒地游着泳。

sentences.en: Bikini queen says aimed to show Pakistan as modern.
sentences.cn: 比基尼女王称目的在展现巴基斯坦的现代感.

sentences.en: But a black bikini, becauseshe still has to mourn.
sentences.cn: 但得是黑色的比基尼.因为她还是要服丧的.

sentences.en: Her bikini was one of those expensive designer jobbies.
sentences.cn: 她的比基尼泳装是那种价格昂贵的名牌产品。

sentences.en: Many old people find the bikini immodest.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人感到穿比基尼式游泳服不正派.

sentences.en: She looked very provocative in her bikini.
sentences.cn: 穿着比基尼泳装的她看来十分具挑逗性.

sentences.en: Show your confidence with this Low bikini that shows your class!
sentences.cn: 用这显示你品位的低腰比基尼展现你的自信!

sentences.en: The sexy starlet was a real eye - popper in her black bikini.
sentences.cn: 身着黑色比基尼的性感女星实在令人大饱眼福.

sentences.en: Wearing only her bikini top and mini - skirt to save the world.
sentences.cn: 只有她穿着比基尼和 迷你 衫才能拯救这个世界.

sentences.en: Who's that girl in red bikini?
sentences.cn: 那个穿红色比基尼的女孩是谁?

sentences.en: Women are also asked to wear bikini style bathing suit top.
sentences.cn: 妇女还要求穿比基尼式游泳衣顶端.

sentences.en: Young lady bikini sunbathes on top of HDB carpark: Isn't this dangerous?
sentences.cn: 女子身穿比基尼在组屋顶楼停车场晒日光浴: 不危险 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 比基尼乳罩；比基尼式纹胸；比基尼上装

trans.tran_cn: 比基尼式游泳衣，比基尼岛
trans.tran_en: a set of clothes worn by women for swimming, which consists of a top part covering the breasts, and a bottom part
